title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: AR-Based Language Professional Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience

learning_goals: Implement three core competencies required in language education settings (communication, problem-solving, creative application) using AR technology
